text: Youyu tamen pohuaile tamen de nuoyan, suoyi, wo qianzele tamen, bing shi tamen de xin bian ying. Tamen cuangai jingdian yuanwen, bing paoqile tamen suo bei quan jie de yixie zhongyao jing wen. Tamen zhong chu shaoshu ren wai, ni jiang jingchang faxian qizha zai tamen zhong shengxing. Ni dang yuanliang tamen, dang kuanrong tamen. An la dique xihuan xingshan zhe.
